alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:22AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Garfield County through 215 AM MDT... At 122 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edwards, or 27 miles southwest of Jordan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordan, Sand Springs, Cohagen, Edwards, Van Norman and Steve Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM MDT for northeastern Montana.
